Also, is it possible to do a global search to see if we have done this in other modules too?

@iyerr3  @orhankislal All the `*_for_centrality_measures` functions are currently only used in `pagerank` and `hits`, which are centrality measures. They can potentially be used in future centrality measure modules, hence the generic name and not something like `*hits_pagerank*`. 

Any suggestions on what is a better naming convention?
SUCCESS
